answers.answer: It could be discharge if anything

It's possible that your water breaks. The doctor told me that its likely that your second child will come quicker than your first because your body already knows what to do. I had my daughter at 38 weeks exact, so I can either have him this week or next week. I'll be 38 weeks next week. So if you feel regular contractions go to the hospital..in fact time them

Um if you are only 31 weeks and you think your water broke you are to early you need to get to the Dr asap. Baby will be premature and the sooner you get there they may be able to do something to help. Go in and good luck
When my water broke it was all clear fluid, u should call your doctor to make sure everything is ok u definitely don't wanna have ur baby yet

At 32 weeks I thought mine broke but it didn't. I went to the hospital and they said my water is still in tact but I was having contractions and dilated at 2cm.they had to give me steroids to mature his lungs and magnesium to stop the contractions... So I know he's not going to stay inside until June 11tg

It sounds like discharge to me. From my understanding when your water breaks it is clear and not creamy. I'm 26 weeks and experience discharge like that a couple times a week. Always safe to call your doctor and explain symptoms though. It is common for second babies to come early but doesn't always happen. I know a few girls who had their first early and went over due on their second. Also, where your first baby was taken early because of pre eclampsia I wouldn't go based on how far along you were with that one. There is no telling when they would have come if you hadn't needed medical intervention. Good luck in your pregnancy!

If I was you I'll go because you only 31 weeks and plus u already had to child at 31 weeks... Better to be safe then sorry...I'll keep you in my prayers because I was very scared when I thought my broke.The baby lungs isn't developed until at least 34 weeks
Put on a liner as well and you figure out if its discharge urine or water leakage
If you think it's your water go to the hospital, you could get an infection!

question: I was just sitting here eating and I felt a small gush of fluid come out. Its clear and a little creamy... I think. I called my mom for advice since she has had 8 and she said wait awhile if its my water ill start feeling pain in awhile. Anyone experience this before and it wasn't water breaking? This is my second baby but first baby came at 31.2 weeks and it was because of preeclampsia so I never got to feel contractions or water breaking.
title: water break at 31 weeks?
